title: Lightroom/Photoshop Editor
job_overview:
Photo Editor (Lightroom & Photoshop) – Construction & Real Estate

We’re on the hunt for a confident photo editor who’s skilled in Lightroom and Photoshop to join Mizzi Media on a long-term basis. Our clients span across construction and real estate, and we’re looking for someone who can consistently match the tone and energy of our brand.

Key Responsibilities:

Daily editing of photo sets in Lightroom (main software used)

Colour grading that suits the tone of the project

Object removal and clean-up in Photoshop

HDR bracketing and image blending

Carousel and banner creation for social media

Style Direction:
Check out our page for editing Upgrade to see actual info

Construction: Grittier, darker-toned edits with mood and contrast

Real Estate: Clean, vibrant, and polished — always bright and inviting

Must-Haves:

Strong English communication (written + verbal)

Available in or close to AEST timezone (Australia-based team)

High attention to detail and consistency across galleries

Reliable turnaround and good file management

Trial Edit Task:
Please complete the following using this pack:
Upgrade to see actual info

Tasks to complete:

1x HDR bracketed image

3–4 edited stills (reference our Instagram look and feel)

1x Instagram-style banner (refer to our IG layout for vibe)

We’re looking for someone we can work with regularly. If you’re confident you can match our style and edit efficiently, we want to hear from you.
